Clear Secrets

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x20
Size:
0x4

Description

Firmware writable register that will clear flops containing device secrets. Keyvault is flushed, along with UDS, FE, and OBF KEY. This is a failsafe mechanism for unexpected security state changes.

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:1] - - - -
[0] clear_secrets w 0x0 -
